description:
small single-stack <info>Rubicon Industries</info> <color_yellow>magazine</color> designed for snipers, colored black with a sculpted metal finish.
RI's logo is printed on the side of the magazine, with an extra sticker of a long bullet, and will probably only work with RI's weapons.

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>
